tag_list: media, communication, public-relations, pr, management, sevenload, social-media
overview:
Mike Schnoor is Public Relations Officer at the Federal Association of Digital Economy (Bundesverband Digitale Wirtschaft e.V.) in Germany.

Prior to this position, he was Head of Public Relations & Corporate Communications at sevenload, one of the world’s largest social video networks for premium TV content, music videos and interactive web TV channel. His volunteer activities included supporting the Federal Association of Digital Economy as Head of Business Development & Marketing for the Social Media Division as well as organizing the Twittwoch Cologne events for Social Media professionals.

As an expert in PR and Social Media, he acts with a profound knowledge and a high degree of consulting skills. His extensive knowledge in the specific use of modern communication tools, communication management in challenging market environments as well as contacts to opinion leaders complement his ambivalent profile.

As author and blogger, he writes actively since 2003 about Social Media, Public Relations, Marketing, Communication, Media and Management.

Mike is considered as the third most influential german blogger for hot start-up discussions according to Wirtschaftswoche (09/09/08).
